  Examination of Climate Changes Impact On Sea Level

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

# Learn more about creating websites with Distill at:
# https://rstudio.github.io/distill/website.html

library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r data}
raw_data <- read_csv("csiro_alt_gmsl_mo_2015.csv", col_types = cols(
  Time = col_date(format = ""),
  GMSL = col_double()
)) %>%
  as_tibble()


```
```{r Sea-Level}
raw_data %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Time, y = GMSL)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x, se = TRUE) +
  theme_economist() +
  labs(x = "Years", y = "Sea Level (mm)",
       title = "Change in Sea Levels from 1993 to 2015",
       subtitle = "Rise In Sea Levels Indicate Graduale Warming of Earths Climate",
       caption = "Source: NOAA (2015)")
```
